overview: Ömer is the mischievous son of a wealthy family. His grandmother makes a will to put an end to his grandson's extravagance. According to the will, Ömer will be able to have her wealth only on one condition. This condition is that Ömer works for a year in a job where he will understand life. With the unexpected death of his grandmother, Ömer takes a job as a driver for a wealthy family. However, the family's relationship with their young daughter, Neriman, will gain a different dimension over time.
title: Chauffeur of the Little Lady
